程序包 cn.sharesdk.framework
的使用

  • 使用cn.sharesdk.framework的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    cn.sharesdk.demo  
    cn.sharesdk.framework  
    cn.sharesdk.framework.authorize  
    cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare  
  • cn.sharesdk.demo使用的cn.sharesdk.framework中的类 
    类和说明
    CustomPlatform
    Extends this class to add your custom platform into ShareSDK as a plug-in.
    FakeActivity
    in order to simplify integrating steps, ShareSDK only provides a single Activity (ShareSDKUIShell) for developers to process GUI logic like authorization.
    Platform
    Platform template of ShareSDK.
    Platform.ShareParams
    a list of param to share ShareParams is used in method Platform.share(ShareParams), each platform has its ShareParams, most of time ShareParams are different between platforms.
    PlatformActionListener
    operation callback
  • cn.sharesdk.framework使用的cn.sharesdk.framework中的类 
    类和说明
    CustomPlatform
    Extends this class to add your custom platform into ShareSDK as a plug-in.
    FakeActivity
    in order to simplify integrating steps, ShareSDK only provides a single Activity (ShareSDKUIShell) for developers to process GUI logic like authorization.
    Platform
    Platform template of ShareSDK.
    Platform.ShareParams
    a list of param to share ShareParams is used in method Platform.share(ShareParams), each platform has its ShareParams, most of time ShareParams are different between platforms.
    PlatformActionListener
    operation callback
    PlatformDb
    authorization database for every platform
    Service
    Service is a kind of plag-in in ShareSDK.
  • cn.sharesdk.framework.authorize使用的cn.sharesdk.framework中的类 
    类和说明
    TitleLayout
    This is a built-in "title bar" controls, mainly used for authorization.
  • cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare使用的cn.sharesdk.framework中的类 
    类和说明
    FakeActivity
    in order to simplify integrating steps, ShareSDK only provides a single Activity (ShareSDKUIShell) for developers to process GUI logic like authorization.
    Platform
    Platform template of ShareSDK.
    Platform.ShareParams
    a list of param to share ShareParams is used in method Platform.share(ShareParams), each platform has its ShareParams, most of time ShareParams are different between platforms.
    PlatformActionListener
    operation callback
